attributes.action: Stop ignoring the plight of single women in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see fair play for single women  on low incomes in the UK. At present we get no allowances even though we have to house and clothe ourselves like everyone else.After we retire the life of poverty coninues as our pensions are lower than mens.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
